channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Prosecutors say they plan to retry Karen Read after mistrial declared in murder case
item.description: A judge declared a mistrial Monday after jurors said they were at an impasse in the murder trial of Karen Read, the Massachusetts woman accused of killing her police officer boyfriend in 2022.

item.title: Hundreds of millions at risk from Chinese shopping app malware
Dua Lipa ‘flying high’ as she announces her biggest show to date after Glastonbury triumph
item.description: What's next for Dua Lipa?

item.title: NYC Pride celebration erupts in chaos as violent brawls break out at Washington Square Park
item.description: Shocking footage captured the intense brawls and fights in Washington Square Park after New York City’s Pride Parade on Sunday - with police having to intervene to calm the unruly revelers

item.title: Watch: Man pass giant beach ball 7,827 times to reclaim world record
item.description: A pair of Idaho men spent 1 hour, 8 minutes and 52 seconds passing a giant inflatable ball back and forth a total 7,827 times to reclaim a Guinness World Records title.

item.title: Prosecutors say they plan to retry Karen Read after mistrial declared in murder case
item.description: A judge declared a mistrial Monday after jurors said they were at an impasse in the murder trial of Karen Read, the Massachusetts woman accused of killing her police officer boyfriend in 2022.

item.title: Russian authorities detain suspect over St. Petersburg cafe blast
Double Emmerdale exit ‘confirmed’ as Tom King story reaches dramatic peak
item.description: Alarm bells are ringing.

item.title: New summer wave of Covid to hit vulnerable group hardest in 'worrying' development
item.description: A new Covid variant is rising in the UK as scientists say we are facing another “wave” of COvid - with most infections taking place in the elderly

item.title: Canadian pet chicken identifies letters, numbers to break world record
item.description: A British Columbia chicken earned a Guinness World Record by identifying different numbers, colors and letters.

item.title: Hunter Biden sues Fox News under New York's 'revenge porn' law
item.description: Hunter Biden is accusing Fox News in a lawsuit of distributing “revenge porn” by broadcasting nude images of him as part of a miniseries that was available on the conservative outlet’s streaming service, Fox Nation.

item.title: READ: Trump indictment related to hush money payment
Paloma Faith has made a really good point about Glastonbury and female headliners
item.description: Paloma is taking no nonsense.

item.title: Karen Read's deadlocked jury leads to mistrial in police officer boyfriend's death
item.description: Karen Read was accused of killing her boyfriend, Boston police Officer John O'Keefe, by hitting him with her SUV and leaving him in a snowstorm

item.title: Watch: Military horses escape in London for the second time in under three months
item.description: Three British military horses broke free from their handlers and ran loose through the streets of central London -- the second such incident in the past three months.

item.title: BET posts 'unfiltered' Usher speech after censorship during live awards ceremony
item.description: BET has shared Usher's full speech when accepting his Lifetime Achievement Award at the 2024 BET Awards, following criticism from fans that the live broadcast was heavily censored.

item.title: Trump pleads not guilty to 34 felony counts
I am worried about housing – who should I vote for in the General Election?
item.description: July 4 is quickly approaching...

item.title: Rishi Sunak hints he could stay on as Tory leader if he loses General Election
item.description: Rishi Sunak has already insisted he will stay on as MP for his area if he is re-elected - but he has now hinted he could continue as Conservative leader if the party loses the election

item.title: Look: Pennsylvania firefighters rescue four ducklings from storm drain
item.description: A team of Pennsylvania firefighters climbed into a storm drain to rescue a family of four trapped ducklings.

item.title: Supreme Court's immunity ruling will delay Trump's Jan. 6 case until after election
item.description: The Supreme Court's presidential immunity decision will further delay special counsel Jack Smith's Jan. 6 case against former President Donald Trump.

item.title: The haunting Masters meltdown that changed Rory McIlroy's career
item.description: Slumped on his club, head buried in his arm, Rory McIlroy looked on the verge of tears.

item.title: Shock EastEnders ‘couple’ get passionate – as teen is left to die alone
item.description: They are totally distracted.

item.title: 'Effective' pruning trick will make tomato plants thrive this summer - and taste better
item.description: Green-thumbed Brits will soon be harvesting their tomato plants, but one gardening expert has shared a simple pruning trick that can help you achieve a thriving vegetable selection

item.title: Giant pandas Yun Chuan and Xin Bao arrive safely at San Diego Zoo
item.description: The San Diego Zoo announced the safe arrival of Yun Chuan and Xin Bao, the first giant pandas to enter the country in 21 years.
